amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by the Secretary of Defense to close a commissary store.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Secretary of Defense to close a commissary store.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Ross.
